name: Runkeeper Fitness Feed
author: Michael Cartwright

sections.description:
The Runkeeper WordPress Widget allows you to display up to the last 20 Runkeeper activities
with the widget area in your WordPress blog. It displays:

  • Activity type
  • Distance (km)
  • Duration (h:m:s)

You can customise the following:

  • Feed title
  • Feed length (1, 5, 10, 15, 20)
  • Display size (small, medium, large)
sections.installation:
1. Download the latest version
  2. Copy it into the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Authorise the use of the widget with Runkeeper by visiting http://pragmaticrunner.com/code/runkeeper-wordpress-widget/
  5. Copy the code that was sent via email
  6. Paste the code into the ‘Auth Code’ field (Appearance > Widgets > Runkeeper Feed)
  7. (Optional) Customize the plugin Title, Feed length and Display size.
sections.faq:
Is Runkeeper Fitness Feed free?

Yes, but acknowledgement on your blog would always be nice.

Do I need a Runkeeper account?

Sure do. Otherwise it’ll display elephants.

short_description: The Runkeeper Fitness Feed adds a widget which displays up to your last 20 activities.
